<a id="class_PanelContainer"></a>

# PanelContainer

**Inherits:** [Container](class_container.md) **<** [Control](class_control.md) **<** [CanvasItem](class_canvasitem.md) **<** [Node](class_node.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

**Inherited By:** [OpenXRBindingModifierEditor](class_openxrbindingmodifiereditor.md), [ScriptEditor](class_scripteditor.md)

A container that keeps its child controls within the area of a [StyleBox](class_stylebox.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A container that keeps its child controls within the area of a [StyleBox](class_stylebox.md). Useful for giving controls an outline.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

- [Using Containers](../tutorials/ui/gui_containers.md)

- [2D Role Playing Game (RPG) Demo](https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/2729)
